dc:description: Plain rim w/”cutting out” (Harden, p. 17) just below rim.  Convex sides taper down to pushed-in base.  Base has conical kick extending up into vessel.  Short cylinder attached to kick on inside probably held wick.  Base has short, flat, flaring sides.  Pontil mark.  Random bubbling & impurities near rim.
